Name: Retro Racers
About the game: A Retro Style Classic Arcade Racing Game! Retro Racers sets the pace for 2D top-down classic racing games. Put the pedal to the metal while speeding by your opponents cars to unlock 12 exciting tracks. Collect the 4 classic power-ups along the way (Acceleration, Top Speed, Nitro Boosts and Traction). Avoid oil slicks and time the opening and closing of gates for shortcuts. Return to your childhood in Retro Racers! FEATURES * 12 Exciting Tracks to Race. * Use the 4 Classic Power-Ups (Acceleration, Top Speed, Nitro Boosts and Traction). * Opening and Closing Gates for Shortcuts. * Oil Slicks to Avoid. * HD Graphics at 60FPS. * Gamepad Support. Ready to Race? 3... 2... 1... GO Play Retro Racers Now!
